pages.text: The ware crafting station is a simple workshop; I can use an $(item)Artisan Carver$() to aid me in working with soft materials, molding, and sculpting.

The basic premise of sculpting starts with a full block of material. By carving and smoothing out different segments I can create quality recipients or intricate shapes. $(br2)If I ever want to $(thing)automate$() any of these processes, I should look into a $(l:innovation/light_machines/turntable)turntable$().
